description: Returns details about a core network policy. You can get details about your current live policy or any previous policy version.

parameters.name: CoreNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of a core network.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkPolicy
nested_items.description: The details about a core network policy.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of a core network.

nested_items.name: PolicyVersionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the policy version.

nested_items.name: Alias
nested_items.description: Whether a core network policy is the current LIVE policy or the most recently submitted policy.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of a core network policy.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when a core network policy was created.

nested_items.name: ChangeSetState
nested_items.description: The state of a core network policy.

nested_items.name: PolicyErrors
nested_items.description: Describes any errors in a core network policy.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code associated with a core network policy error.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The message associated with a core network policy error code.

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The JSON path where the error was discovered in the policy document.
